data.title: Tobolsk climate: Weather Tobolsk & temperature by month
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Tobolsk

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Tobolsk

>>average temperature by month Tobolsk

>>Weather Tobolsk

The climatic conditions prevailing in Tobolsk are characterized by cold and temperate weather. It is noteworthy that Tobolsk experiences a considerable volume of precipitation throughout the year, including its least humid month. This location is classified as Dfb by Köppen and Geiger. In Tobolsk, the mean yearly temperature amounts to 1.4 °C | 34.6 °F. The rainfall here is around 597 mm | 23.5 inch per year.

Tobolsk is located in the northern hemisphere. The commencement of summer is observed at the conclusion of June and its culmination takes place in September. The months that constitute this season are known as June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Tobolsk

The month characterized by the lowest precipitation levels is February, exhibiting a mere 22 mm | 0.9 inch of rainfall. The highest amount of precipitation occurs during the month of August, with an average quantity reaching up to 80 mm | 3.1 inch.

average temperature by month Tobolsk

On average, the month of July experiences the highest temperature with an average value of 18.5 °C | 65.3 °F. The month of January registers the most frigid temperatures throughout the year, with an average low temperature of -17.2 °C | 1.0 °F.

Weather by month // weather averages Tobolsk

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d) avg. Sun hours (hours)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

There is a notable fluctuation in precipitation, with 58 mm | 2 inch variance observed between the month of least rainfall and that of highest downpour. Throughout the course of a year, there is an observable fluctuation in average temperatures by 35.7 °C | 64.3 °F.

It is observed that November (83.57) has the highest relative humidity, whereas May (63.12) experiences the lowest. The month with the highest precipitation is June (13.03 days), whereas the one with the lowest amount of rainfall is February (6.43).

Tobolsk weather and climate for every month

Hours of sunshine in Tobolsk

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

At Tobolsk, the month that boasts of the highest number of daily sunshine hours is June with an average duration of 12.33. The total count for this period accumulates to a staggering sum of 369.77 sunlight hours.

The location of Tobolsk experiences the least number of daily hours with sunshine during January, wherein an average of only 1.47 hours is recorded. The total count for this month's sunlight duration accumulates to a sum value equivalent to 45.62.

Throughout the year, Tobolsk experiences approximately 2399.76 hours of sunshine. The average monthly duration of sunlight is estimated to be around 78.72.

Airport close to Tobolsk

The closest Airports of Tobolsk are: Roshchino International Airport (TJM) 206.27km,Khanty-Mansiysk Airport (HMA) 317.67km

You can reach Tobolsk from this Cities by Plane: Yekaterinburg (SVX), Novosibirsk (OVB), Omsk (OMS), Ufa (UFA), Tyumen (TJM), Tashkent (TAS), Yerevan (EVN), Saint Petersburg (LED), Salekhard (SLY), Khanty-Mansiysk (HMA), Surgut (SGC), Nizhnevartovsk (NJC), Noyabrsk (NOJ), Moscow (DME), Надым (NYM), Novy Urengoy (NUX)
